sys_hub_flow.description:
Create a new catalog item with a flow designer to assign tickets
Create a new catalog item called " Request Access Card"
Fields are:
"User" -> Dropdown list from users table, Automatically filled based on current user
"user location" ->Read only dropdown list from location, automatically filled based on the user's field location
"Pickup date" -> Date field, should always be bigger than today
when this item is submitted, an approval of the manger is requests and when approved a new sc_task is created to the helpdesk team
The agent from Helpdesk should be able to see the User field and all the other variables in the SC Task form
Short description format should be " Provide access card to {User Name}"

Create a new catalog item called " Request Access Card"
Fields are:
"User" -> Dropdown list from users table, Automatically filled based on current user
"user location" ->Read only dropdown list from location, automatically filled based on the user's field location
"Pickup date" -> Date field, should always be bigger than today
when this item is submitted, an approval of the manger is requests and when approved a new sc_task is created to the helpdesk team
The agent from Helpdesk should be able to see the User field and all the other variables in the SC Task form
Short description format should be " Provide access card to {User Name}"
